description: {"blocks":[{"key":"hkn4","text":"This custom protocol optimizes extraction, purification, and Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) MinION library preparation for ultra-high molecular weight genomic DNA (uHMW gDNA) from parasitic nematodes.
